price: 12. Tada, kai jie suvokė (pamatė) Mūsų Kančią (ateinančią), štai, jie (bandė) pabėgti nuo jos.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falammā aḥassū basanā idhā hum min'hā yarkuḍūna
